programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Slide into the smooth and stylish world of "Chic Groove Hits." This playlist is all about effortlessly cool rhythms, refined beats, and that sleek K-pop edge that gets you moving without even trying. Each track carries a confident flow and polished vibe that turns any moment into a mini runway. Expect nothing less than groove, grace, and a hint of glam. (Track List: KISS OF LIFE - Heart of Gold / ILLIT - My World / ifeye - NERDY / ODD EYE CIRCLE - Air Force One / AB6IX - BREATHE / RESCENE - YoYo / APRIL - LALALILALA / CIX - 458 / UAU - Sacrifice / MONSTA X - Love Killa / KISS OF LIFE - Lips Hips Kiss / CLASS:y - Psycho and Beautiful / TOMORROW X TOGETHER - Can’t You See Me? / NMIXX - KNOW ABOUT ME / UAU - Attitude / ARTMS - BURN / TEN - STUNNER / YooA - Selfish / KWON EUN BI - Glitch / Red Velvet - Bad Boy / KANGDANIEL - Electric Shock / Lee Chae Yeon - Don’t / MADEIN - UNO / KARD - Tell My Momma / NMIXX - High Horse / Billlie - trampoline / P1Harmony - Murmur / IVE - ELEVEN / CLASS:y - Tick Tick Boom / TWS - Lucky to be loved / SF9 - Tear Drop / fromis_9 - Rewind / FIFTY FIFTY - Midnight Special / YOUNG POSSE - Blue Dot / HWANWOONG (ONEUS) - RADAR)

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Step into the spotlight with the bold, electrifying energy of "Your Idol." This playlist brings together K-pop’s most powerful performances, confidence-filled tracks, and songs that radiate main character energy. Whether you’re on stage or just vibing in your room, these songs will have you owning every moment. It's a celebration of fierce charisma, unapologetic ambition, and the dream of being the idol. (Track List: (G)I-DLE - OH MY GOD / ATEEZ - WONDERLAND / ITZY - In the morning / Monsta X - FANTASIA / GFRIEND - Sunrise / THE BOYZ - The Stealer / WJSN - UNNATURAL / Wanna One - Burn it up / KISS OF LIFE - Igloo / ENHYPEN - Blessed-Cursed / tripleS - Girls Never Die / P1Harmony - End It / EVERGLOW - DUN DUN / Monsta X - DRAMARAMA / TWICE - FANCY / BTS - Blood Sweat & Tears / Dreamcatcher - JUSTICE / EXO - MOSTER / PURPLE KISS - memeM / Seventeen - Getting Closer / LE SSERAFIM - UNFORGIVEN / Stray Kids - Victory Song / Red Velvet - Peek-A-Boo / ATEEZ - I'm The One / GFRIEND - Apple / CIX - Jungle / NMIXX - O.O / Seventeen - CLAP / (G)I-DLE - HANN / THE BOYZ - REVEAL / ITZY - WANNABE / Stray Kids - Thunderous / aespa - Drama / BTS - MIC Drop / TWICE - I CAN'T STOP ME)

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Refresh your day with the bubbly, feel-good vibes of "Soda Pop." Bursting with sweet melodies, playful beats, and a splash of retro charm, this playlist captures the brighter, cuter side of K-pop. Perfect for dance breaks, sunshine strolls, or just boosting your mood. Let these fizzy tunes pop some joy into your world! (Track List: ITZY - ICY / ONF - Popping / (G)I-DLE - Queencard / EVNNE - Badder Love / TWICE - MORE & MORE / EPEX - Youth2Youth / Red Velvet - Power Up / Billlie - EUNOIA / ENHYPEN - Tamed-Dashed / RESCENE - LOVE ATTACK / THE BOYZ - THRILL RIDE / JOYURI - Love Shhh! / NMIXX - Roller Coaster / NCT WISH - Songbird / fromis_9 - Stay This Way / CRAVITY - Adrenaline / OH MY GIRL - Summer Comes / LABOUM - Hwi hwi / BOYNEXTDOOR - Earth, Wind & Fire / YENA - SMILEY / NCT DREAM - Beatbox / H1-KEY - Summer Was You / TWS - Countdown! / STAYC - Bubble / ZEROBASEONE - Feel the POP / WJSN - Happy / KISS OF LIFE - Sticky / TOMORROW X TOGETHER - Blue Orangeade / CHUNG HA - Sparkling / Kep1er - UP! / KARD - Hola Hola)

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Experience the refreshing vibe of summer with the "Essential Summer Soundtrack". From the thrill of road trips to the warmth of sunlit days, this playlist brings summer to life through music. With upbeat energy, catchy choruses, and breezy rhythms, each track captures the essence of what makes K-pop summers unforgettable. Let the music carry you into your own sun-drenched story. (Track List: OH MY GIRL - Summer Comes / SEVENTEEN - Oh My! / ONF - Popping / GFRIEND - Sunny Summer / KISS OF LIFE - Sticky / SF9 - Summer Breeze / TWICE - Dance The Night Away / EXO - Ko Ko Bop / fromis_9 - Stay This Way / THE BOYZ - THRILL RIDE / Red Velvet - Red Flavor / GFRIEND - Fever / ZEROBASEONE - BLUE / OH MY GIRL - Nonstop / Girls’ Generation - PARTY / SHINee - View / CRAVITY - PARTY ROCK / TWS - / RESCENE - LOVE ATTACK / (G)I-DLE - DUMDi DUMDi / ATEEZ - WAVE / Apink - Remember / SEVENTEEN - Our Dawn Is Hotter Than Day / OH MY GIRL - Dolphin / STAYC - Bubble / TWS - Countdown! / fromis_9 - WE GO / cignature - Poongdung / TEMPEST - Unfreeze / Red Velvet - Umpah Umpah / SF9 - SCREAM / TOMORROW X TOGETHER - Blue Orangeade / OH MY GIRL - Dun Dun Dance / ONF - Beautiful Beautiful / NCT DREAM - We Young / Red Velvet - Power Up / TWS - hey! hey! / WJSN (Cosmic Girls) - Boogie Up / SEVENTEEN - VERY NICE / THE BOYZ - D.D.D / Kep1er - Up! / ZEROBASEONE - Feel the POP / Kwon Eun Bi - Underwater)
